entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning before morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
